page.title: 17GAMES CHILDREN PLAY.
page.content: These are some of the games we play in our school playground during playtimes. Some of them are traditional games and some of them are made up. {DIZZY LAND You spin around in circles with your arms outstretched and you bump into each other and fall over. It is best to play this on the grass. {LEAPFROG { }One person bends over and the others jump over the person like a frog. The person bending over gets higher and higher until no one can jump it and then some one else is on. {BUDGE { }In this game one person is "he" and he has to catch the others.Some things like the bench or the drainpipe are home. If another person runs to your "home" you have to budge and run away.
